definition: fire/urgent/ammunition/fiery or flaming/internal heat (Chinese medicine)/hot (popular)/classifier for military units (old)/Kangxi radical 86
mountain/hill/anything that resembles a mountain/CL:座[zuo4]/bundled straw in which silkworms spin cocoons/gable
mouth/classifier for things with mouths (people, domestic animals, cannons, wells etc)/classifier for bites or mouthfuls

sentences.english: The crater in residual volcanic activity that the volcanic cone within.
sentences.chinese: 此火山口里有个显示残馀火山活动的内火山锥。

sentences.english: An ash cone rises from the center of the crater, casting a dark triangular shadow.
sentences.chinese: 火山口中间是火山灰锥，投下了三角形的暗影。

sentences.english: This paper deals with the characteristics of the Qibao-Shan caldera in early Cretaceous.
sentences.chinese: 本文论述了七宝山早白垩世破火山口的特征。

sentences.english: Lava boiled up from the crater of the volcano.
But it isn't just filled-in craters.
sentences.chinese: 但并非仅为火山口占据。

sentences.english: Crater Lake is not connected to any rivers or streams.
sentences.chinese: 火山口湖不与任何江河相连接。

sentences.english: A miner's hut just inside the crater of Kawah Ijen.
sentences.chinese: 一个矿工的小屋只是卡瓦Ijen内的火山口。

sentences.english: The caldera is considered an active volcano.
sentences.chinese: 该破火山口被认为是活火山。

sentences.english: The crater is the essence of Africa.
sentences.chinese: 恩戈罗恩戈罗火山口是非洲精粹。

sentences.english: The extraordinarily deep waters of Crater Lake yield an intense sapphire-blue hue.
sentences.chinese: 火山口湖的深水产生了一种强烈的宝蓝色调。

sentences.english: If you go further, you’ll see the second crater.
sentences.chinese: 如果你继续往前走就会看到第二个火山口。

sentences.english: Orebodies in zonal distribution are strictly controlled by crater structure.
sentences.chinese: 矿体严格受火山口构造控制。

sentences.english: For example, allegedly, jumped into volcano to proof that he was a god.
sentences.chinese: 举个例子，据说有人为了证明自己是神而跳进火山口。

sentences.english: Crater Lake is a popular sight-seeing spot located in America.
sentences.chinese: 火山口围着的地方是美国很热门的旅游景点。

sentences.english: The image is a computer-generated gravity map of the crater.
sentences.chinese: 上面的图像是这个火山口用计算机生成的引力图。

sentences.english: The lip of a cup, saucer, crater.

definition: mouth of a spring or fountain
